feed.title: Bigcapital Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Bigcapital: v0.14.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: purchases by items exporting by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/327
  • fix: Expense amounts should not be rounded by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/339
  • feat: get latest exchange rate from third party services by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/340
  • fix(webapp): inconsistency in currency of universal search items by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/335
  • hotfix: editing sales and expense transactions don't reflect GL entries by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/342

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/compare/v0.13.3...v0.14.0

entry.title: New release for Bigcapital: v0.14.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(server): Revert the paid amount to bill transaction after editing bill payment amount by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/352
  • fix: Invalid bill payment amount on editing bill payment by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/355
  • fix(server): Trial balance total row shouldn't show if accounts have no balances by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/357
  • fix: Payment receive subtotal shouldn't be rounded by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/358
  • fix: Some keywords are not localized by @ANasouf in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/354
  • fix: Gmail email addresses dots gets removed by @ANasouf in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/353

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/compare/v0.14.0...v0.14.1

entry.title: New release for Bigcapital: v0.15.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Printing financial reports by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/363
  • feat: Convert invoice status after sending mail notification by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/332
  • feat: Bigcapital <> Plaid Integration by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/346
  • fix: Broken transactions by vendor report by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/369
  • fix: Optimize the print style some financial reports by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/370

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/compare/v0.14.1...v0.15.0

entry.title: New release for Bigcapital: v0.15.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Universal search should auto-focus when it opens by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/371

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/compare/v0.15.0...v0.15.1
